game.name: New Fashion Diva
game.description:
Hey girls! Have you ever dreamt of playing the role a popular fashion diva in your city? Do fashion games trigger your fun senses in a great manner? If yes, playing out New Fashion Diva can be a nice bet for you. This brand new girls game will allow you to create some amazing fashion looks in a friendly environment. Choose a casual look, or hip-pop girl style, classic beauty or Edgy and high fashion as per your personal preferences!

You cannot take a chance when you are going to dress up a true fashion diva. These gorgeous girls will have four different activities to take care of. Firstly, you have to dress up Niki for the most popular music festival of the city in this html5 dressing game. Give your girl a purple t-shirt with a big leopard print and pair it with a blue scarf tied around it, long and beautiful hair, and a pair of black boots with heels! A pair of gorgeous denim shorts combined with an orange flower printed crop top will be perfect for Lily.

Niki would love to wear a white and orange crop top paired with a lovely colorful mini-skirt while Lily will look awesome in blue color shorts and leggings. For the homecoming party, dress up your girls with an elegant gown along with a combination of sparkling and beautiful jewelry items. A combination of leather jackets, mini-skirts and a pair of cute jeans will be perfect for the rock concert. Try to prepare each with the perfect outfits for each occasion in this princess dress-up game! Play popular titles from the category of free girls games and have fun online!
